apiDoc.name: HighlightCardFeed
apiDoc.description: A card for displaying text highlights (NIP-84) in feed layouts. Features book page-style design with optional author header, source information, and custom action buttons. Includes hover effects and supports custom snippet for actions area. Exports three variants: HighlightCardFeed, HighlightCardGrid, and HighlightCardElegant.
